definitions.definition: To condemn ; to consider wrong or inappropriate ; used with of .
examples: She disapproves of rap music because of its sometimes aggressive lyrics.

definitions.definition: To have or express an unfavorable opinion. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
examples: Green washing schemes of corporations are disapproved by Greenpeace activists.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To condemn ; to consider wrong or inappropriate ; used with of .
secondary_definitions: To have or express an unfavorable opinion. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
( transitive ) To refuse to approve ; reject .
